summary: "Like a Prayer" is a popular song by Madonna from 1989. It's about a young girl in love with God. The song is a mix of pop rock and gospel with a rock guitar and choir. It was a big hit, reaching number one in many countries. The music video caused controversy because it showed religious images and a black saint. This made the Vatican and religious groups angry. Despite this, the song is still considered one of the greatest of all time. Madonna has performed it many times on her tours.
title: Like a Prayer (song)
